title: Special event permits (festivals, concerts, parades)
dataVerified: Organizer, event details, location, attendance, alcohol service, police/fire/EMS
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake event permits. Domain binding verifies city/county. Public safety verification (police/fire approval). Liability insurance requirement. Prevents unpermitted large gatherings. Noise ordinance compliance.
